name: Cave diver (samuelalan12)
description: My first game ever. Storyline/lore is that as an adventurer, John is part of a guild. soon after his latest mission, he is informed of a strange energy coming from the caves below his own home. Now his goal is to investigate where it is coming from Controls are WASD for movement, M1 for bow, m2 for sword, Q for warp pads. Dev controls are 1- next room, 2 - previous room, 3 - procgen showcase.
